EMERGENCY OVERVIEW:
Color:
Colorless to yellow
Physical State:
Solid
Odor:
Odorless when not exposed to air
Signal word:
DANGER
MAJOR HEALTH HAZARDS:
CAUSES BURNS TO THE RESPIRATORY TRACT, SKIN, EYES AND GASTROINTESTINAL TRACT. MAY CAUSE
KIDNEY, LIVER AND BONE DAMAGE. MAY CAUSE PERMANENT EYE DAMAGE.
PHYSICAL HAZARDS SUMMARY STATEMENT:
Flammable solid. Will ignite on contact with air.
AQUATIC TOXICITY:
Harmful to Aquatic Organisms.
